message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $140?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $142?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $135?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $137?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130?
